welcome: Reborn Daycare – Care and love for your reborn baby
aboutText: Your reborn baby will feel at home with us. Here, they have a structured routine full of love, attention, and stimulation — everything a baby needs to be happy.

dailyActivities.title: At our daycare, the day is filled with:
activities: Peaceful nap time with soft music
Daily photo session with outfit of the day

benefits.title: Everything is designed for the baby to have a calm, happy, and complete day — and you too.
benefits.subtitle: Because yes, the baby deserves full attention.
benefits.description: But your peace of mind is precious too. You don't need to live on alert, nor forget to take care of yourself while worrying if their diaper was changed.

pricing.text: For just $25 per day, we guarantee care, love, and a routine that works.

tagline.line2: Your baby well. You at peace.
